content.p: Each placement involves a discrete project at an external organisation for which the postgraduate researcher acts as a specialist consultant. The placements are delivered in partnership with a wide range of employers from small local businesses to multinational organisations. We generally offer two types of placement: part-time projects, up to 200 hours, for a period of 3-6 months. full-time 3 month internships. Receive weekly email updates of vacancies. Let us know what kind of projects interest you. Receive emails highlighting vacancies relevant to your skills and experience. UON researchers and staff contact form Follow us on social media: YouTube | LinkedIn
